selection.name: Xen
selection.description: Sets up a Server for hosting virtual machines using XEN virtual machine monitor.

selection.name: X11
selection.description: In continuous use for over 20 years, the X Window System provides the only standard platform-independent networked graphical window system bridging the heterogeneous platforms in today's enterprise: from network servers to desktops, thin clients, laptops, and hand-helds, independent of operating system and hardware.

selection.name: Mono
selection.description: A Mono development environment.

selection.name: Kernel-Devel
selection.description: Everything you need to build the Linux kernel and do Linux kernel development.

selection.name: Kde
selection.description: KDE is a powerful Free Software graphical desktop environment for Linux and Unix workstations. It combines ease of use, contemporary functionality, and outstanding graphical design with the technological superiority of the Unix operating system. This selection contains all KDE applications.

selection.name: Multimedia
selection.description: SUSE Linux gives you all the tools you need for supporting, creating, editing, organizing and managing multimedia like media player, digital photo organizer, CD/DVD burning etc.

selection.name: Latex
selection.description: Documentation can be written using LaTeX, SGML or XML - and processed with the tools in this group.

selection.name: Gnome
selection.description: The GNOME desktop environment is an intuitive and attractive desktop for end-users, users, and the GNOME development platform, an extensive framework for building applications that integrate into the rest of the desktop.

selection.name: Kde-Desktop
selection.description: KDE is a powerful Free Software graphical desktop environment for Linux and Unix workstations. It combines ease of use, contemporary functionality, and outstanding graphical design with the technological superiority of the Unix operating system.
